document_data.name: Y'tossi
document_data.mainbody: '''Y'tossi''' was a [[marilith]] who was linked to [[Watcher's Keep]] as of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Y'tossi had a number of boons from her [[demon]]ic heritage. She had natural [[regenerate|regeneration]], was [[Negate magical weapons|protected from less-powerful magical weapons]], and could [[See invisibility|see through invisibility]] at will.
document_data.Possessions: She wore a pair of ''[[gauntlets of extraordinary specialization]]'' and wielded an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] ''[[sword of flame]]''.
document_data.Activities: Y'tossi and her companions served as one of the three groups connected to the fifth level of Watcher's Keep, which held the final seal that kept away the being known as the [[Demogorgon|Imprisoned One]]. The group was summoned to the keep when the ''heart key'' was used to unlock the seal.
document_data.Relationships: She was accompanied by her fellow [[demon]]s [[Nalmissra]], [[Xei Win Toh]], and the [[Huntress]], along with an unnamed [[hive mother]] and the [[elf]] [[Ameralis Zauviir]].
